website_summaries.verdict: Animal-themed nesting dolls with an educational component.
pros: Little penguin nesting dolls made of tough plastic and paint that won't peel off
Set also comes with interesting tidbits of information about penguins
cons: Components are small, and may be a choking hazard for children under 3

customer_reviews.title: My toddlers love playing with these - ages 1-4
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers love playing with these - ages 1-4. The 1 year olds did put the smallest in their mouth though. They are fun and cute. I used a pint glass and quarter to show size.
customer_reviews.author: nicole harvey

customer_reviews.title: Print is coming off
customer_reviews.text: 2nd review after a few more weeks: The print is coming off two of the penguins - you can basically rub of the paint, which makes it unusable. It is as if the paint is not sealed. 1st review: So great for my son to play with. They hold up well even though he has dropped them on the ground several times. A bit of the paint on one of them got scratched, but besides that they are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small hands
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 15 month old grandson who had become obsessed with my Russian nesting dolls. I was concerned that the paint would end up in his mouth or that he would get splinters (he's pretty tough on toys) so I looked for a child-friendly solution at a reasonable price. These adorable little penguins were just the thing: he loves the big eyes, and there are enough of them to keep him busy trying to put the individual birds together and then nest them. I don't expect them to last forever, but for now they are perfectly sturdy and enjoyable for his fat little hands and offer plenty of opportunity to build manual dexerity and fine motor skills.
customer_reviews.author: MomNMore

customer_reviews.title: Plastic and durable and adorable
customer_reviews.text: Stinking adorable! They are hard plastic, not wood FYI. The smallest one actually opens up too surprisingly. They were packaged well and my kids already love them.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron and Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: Great unique gift!
customer_reviews.text: When you can't find something to give your weird, nerdy, but really cool nephew, this is what you get for him! He is eleven, and likes penguins too, so this was a win-win. He loves 'em, from what I hear, and has them displayed prominently. They are made of sturdy materials, so great for youngsters (including the younger brother who insists on playing with it too ;) ) and the packaging has facts on it too. If the kids are so inclined to read it (my nephews were not, but there you go.)
customer_reviews.author: joanne

customer_reviews.title: A Great Hit with My Grandson
customer_reviews.text: I was taking my almost 2 year old grandson to the beach and wanted to have a couple new toys that would be easy to pack. My mom has a set of nesting eggs that my grandson likes, so I thought the nesting penguins would be worth a try. My grandson loved them and played with them A LOT! I also bought a nuts and bolts play set, and they were hardly touched. The smallest nesting penguin could be a choking hazard. The package clearly states it is for ages 3+. So we just took the smallest penguin out. The penguins are easy for small hands to take apart and put back together. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: These penguins are made of nice plastic (fairly sturdy and not cheap looking). They are easier to pull apart than some of the wooden ones that can swell and get stuck together (and become difficult for a child to open). The child I bought them for loves them. When she plays with these, she is clearly thinking about and learning how to fit smaller sizes into larger sizes. It is simple but seems quite educational for her. The smallest penguin would probably be a choking hazard for a toddler, so I would recommend removing that one before giving it to a very young kid.
customer_reviews.author: Lisak

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this nesting penguin set and upon receiving I could tell that it was cheaply made plastic. It is definitely not worth $16.95. I ordered it through Amazon Prime, so I thought I could do an easy return. I went to do a return and it says this item is not available for return. No where in the description does it say cannot return. Now I am stuck with a stupid $17 piece of plastic garbage.
customer_reviews.author: JalaG

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected and made of plastic
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this is great for someone but not for us. We had gotten another nesting doll on Amazon that was made of wood and larger, so unfortunately we were expecting the same. Black is also a bad choice of mine in retrospect since once the pieces roll away they are almost impossible to find again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: Buy this toy!  It's fun! And cute!
customer_reviews.text: Best toy! The smallest penguin opens and you can put a jelly belly inside. My daughter adores this toy and plays with it daily! All the penguins open and close easily, look wonderful, match up and are perfect. Better than anticipated. This is great for a 2 year old to learn eye hand coordination skills, sizes, etc. the smallest penguin may be too small for a 2 year old so she only gets this when we are playing with her (choking hazard). She calls it the "baby" and if we only bought this toy for her birthday she would have been very happy. Best stacking toy!
customer_reviews.author: NWSwallow

customer_reviews.title: Best toy for my 22 months old girl
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that my daughter was playing with 2 egg shell Toys that are similar to nesting dolls at a friend's house. so immidiately thought I had to get some sort of toys like that. And found this, and it's now her favorite toy. She won't stop playing with it unless I take it away. Today it went on a about solid 40 minutes only with this toy before I had to take it away for bed. I have never seen her playing with 1 single toy for that long. I am really happy i bought this :) and they are so cute!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin K.

customer_reviews.title: It's a HIT
customer_reviews.text: When my almost two year old granddaughter saw this new toy in her box of stuff at Grandma's, the first thing she did was take it apart, and again, and again, and again until she got to the tiniest one. She played with it nonstop for over an hour, with an intensity I found fascinating. Her little hands were flying, taking them all apart then trying to piece them back together again - it reminded me of the kids who have those Speed Stacks competitions. I knew she'd like this toy because she likes taking things apart and putting them back together, but she LOVES this Penguin. Score one for Grandma, yaaaay.
customer_reviews.author: Jbeyar

customer_reviews.title: Know your child, smallest penguin is very small
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old daughter loves these guys! She loves to shake them and hear the noise and you never know when penguins will come flying out! She is finally getting the idea of trying to put them back together. They are cute to look at and easy to see when they are all apart and scattered on the floor. ***I did put the smallest penguin away for now because he is mouth sized,*** but there are still 5 others for her to stack and play.
customer_reviews.author: Black1304

customer_reviews.title: 3 yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this. I wanted a real russian stacking doll but wasnt sure how she would take to it for the price of one. I saw that other similar non russian made and wooden ones may have painting issues that made it difficult to open. This was relatively cheaper and made of plastic which was a good material for any child. Also my daughter wanted to take it with her into her bath so that worked out well! A family of penguins was suitable just as she got addicted to the finger family song!
customer_reviews.author: SamSpenceTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: NOT WOODEN SET
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit....these are super cute and my 3 y/o granddaughter loves them BUT they are not wooden nesting dolls, they are plastic. I re-read the description & I do not see anything about them being plastic. I do see in the question/comments about them being plastic now & the packaging does say that they meet the CA standards for plastics. Would buy again...nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Shooda

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Cute product! My 2 year old played with this for hours when I got it for her. Although the smallest 2 would easily fit in a child's mouth, so if the child has that tendency to put things in their mouth then I wouldn't buy it for them. It's plastic and I don't think the pieces would hold up if they were stepped on. But if you take care of it and keep the pieces off the floor, it's a great little learning toy.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Caquelin

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and cute but made out of cheap material for the price. The largest one opens too easily just from weight of little ones inside and doesn't remain close, the paint on it scratches off way to easy as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_JunkieTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: These penguins are my son's favorite toy! He is really upset when he can't ...
customer_reviews.text: These penguins are my son's favorite toy! He is really upset when he can't find them and is the first thing he thinks about in the morning. Lol. Some of them are really little but I don't allow him to use those because he puts some toys in his mouth, but they are great! None of the paint has come off, we have had them for a while and the only thing that's even slightly annoying is one of them has started making a squeak noise when he turns it but it really isn't a big deal to me. They are definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE THESE! They are super cute and easy to put together and take apart. The reason I gave them 4 stars is because the paint started flaking off after just a couple days, but most of the paint is still on there. The paint flakes mostly right where the plastic meets. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Nesting Toys
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable nesting toys! They have become a favorite toy at our house and have held up beautifully, and trust me they have been VERY WELL used. There are 6 penguins in this set. All 6 of them open, and the baby (or the littlest one) is sleeping. Since they are plastic they also have made fun bath toys as well. The dolls hold together too, unlike some other plastic nesting toys we have had. I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old nephew is fascinated with stacking dolls and this was the perfect gift. The image on the doll was clear and shiny, as the dolls stacked neatly and snapped tight. Nice purchase
customer_reviews.author: teacherchick

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute, but not very durable. The paint scratches off easily and they did not stand up well to my three-year-old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: nice toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice toy for stocking stuffers. My both sons like to play with it a little bit. My younger son (2)takes all the penguins out and doesn't have ability to put them back together. So he makes mess on the floor with all the pieces, that usually gets accidentally kicked elsewhere. It is a cute toy though.
customer_reviews.author: Woodrow F. Dick III

customer_reviews.title: Penguins Rule!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter (3) is totally obsessed with penguins. She also loves nesting dolls, so this was a perfect fit. The other nesting dolls I've purchased for her are Russian, hand painted wooden beauties. She LOVED these guys. Plastic, yes, but that makes them ok for the tub! Well made & so cute! Great gift..... and I received these super fast. Thanks for excellent service!
customer_reviews.author: LadyE

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but will sit on my desk
customer_reviews.text: Good product, seems kinda expensive for what it is. Design is cute, but plastic is kinda cheap and feels oily.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C.

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as shown. Cool toy. Just beware that the smallest of the penguins is pretty small, chokable small for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn O

customer_reviews.title: Great for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: My toddler will entertain herself with these for a good amount of time. I toss them in my bag and take with us if we go out to eat.. helps keep her distracted till food comes
customer_reviews.author: Momof04

customer_reviews.title: Super fun.
customer_reviews.text: 3rd Grade Teacher here - I used this as a demonstration for ST Math on line application. Jiji is the name of the penguin in the web based program. Also, I used this as prizes for the kids, in order to support the learning from ST Math. Super fun.
customer_reviews.author: marco a orozco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My 4 Yr Old Grandson!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my 4 yr old grandson for Christmas 2018 and he still LOVES them as much as he did the day he received them! Great quality and adorable!
customer_reviews.author: doirs

customer_reviews.title: great toy
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 22 month old twins--bought two. I can only let them play with the three largest penguins. The smaller ones seem like a choking hazard. But, they love them. They are able to take them apart and put them together without getting frustrated. I love that they are plastic for this age. They have a very large wooden toy, and I am afraid they will crack it and get splinters. The paint is scratched on one of the penguins, but my guys are pretty rough on toys. They have had them for 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amy7974

customer_reviews.title: Provides fun and challenge for almost-three year old boys. -
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets for my almost 3year old twin grandsons. They are enjoying them very much. The boys were born 14 weeks before their due date so they are a little behind in some skills. These penguins are challenging because they all look the same when taken apart. The boys never tire of working to match the correct top with each bottom. Excellently made and easier to play with than similar wooden sets.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J

customer_reviews.title: micro
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Very small not worth the price, I checked the sizes even and thought they would be bigger. The package says micro on it, and the whole box is the length of my palm. My daughter will still enjoy these but the smallest one being the size of a jelly bean I may have to not give it to her as she is only four.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Penquin Nesting Dolls
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. I prefer wooden nesting dolls vs. these that are plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My toddler's favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter adores this toy - it goes everywhere we go! I love that it is made of plastic instead of thin wood. The only complaint is that they snap together a little too loosely now, but she's seriously spent hours and hours with this toy!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hals

customer_reviews.title: Comes in a clear bag
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a bag, so wrapping is a challenge. But it's a nesting doll with cute penguin faces. Daughter loved playing with it
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and fit together perfectly. Purchased for toddler who loves putting them together. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very cute gift for my young niece. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: HUlby

customer_reviews.title: Endless fun! Every kid coming to visit our home is ...
customer_reviews.text: Endless fun! Every kid coming to visit our home is fascinated with these nest of penguins. My kids still play with it after months. The Penguins all have facial features, so we can define them (baby, brother, mommy, and daddy). Ours have been roughed up and are still intact. Sturdy plastic. Would recommend for young children.
customer_reviews.author: Leila Farley

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the analogy and it's a good non-threatening way to ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these in trauma therapy to explain the concept of how wounds carry over. Kids love the analogy and it's a good non-threatening way to explain the concept. I sometimes give these to kids who are finishing therapy, and they love them. They're very well built and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery S. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Simple use.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson has autism and likes to stack things. These were great for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Wolkenhauer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Penguin Lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and well made! I bought these for a friend who loves penguins and they were not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: 3 yr old won't stop playing with it! He loves it. Only downside is that the outermost penguin doesn't fit together as snugly as it should so it cracks open. Not a big deal though because it's fun to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all very cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap material for the money I pais u should just bohgt here where i leave. Not good . i do not recomend this. I have vendors that try to get reach with cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this "matreshka" for my daughter who was in love with my authentic Russian Matreshka, but was cracking the paint on it. She loves this one! It keeps her entertained for a long time and it goes down to this tiny little penguin which she loves :) She is 2years and 4 months old so the pieces end up everywhere, but overall its awesome for her age because she can't really break it!
customer_reviews.author: AnnaLC

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and my 2YO loves them. I took off a star because the smallest penguin is just too tiny, so I put it away. Otherwise, a cute set.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S Otten

customer_reviews.title: Simple fun!
customer_reviews.text: These nesting penguins are my two year olds favorite toy. It helps with teaching smallest to largest and he plays with them all day. Pretty sturdy, the first few times we dropped these plastic eggs I thought they were broken but they have held up well. I like hiding surprises inside them and lining them up for him to open.
customer_reviews.author: HighlandOak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect penguins!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they're everything I expected and needed for my project. So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Engaging
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old niece loves them BUT trying to keep them together is driving her mother crazy. Could be considered a win-win if that is your goal.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the Penguin lover! My daughter sits them out year round.
customer_reviews.author: Don J. McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not a practical toy for most kids
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and fun. My daughter loved getting this as a present. However, with all the pieces it's super easy for kids to lose them. I was constantly picking up pieces and putting them back together to keep up with everything and when I quit they scattered to the winds, so this is a very 'temporary' toy for most kids, if you know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cute Stackable
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves playing with these. Good detail and tough plastic.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pitzer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy !
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for our grandchild. For youngest children, remove the smallest as it could be a choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: John C HoffmanJr

customer_reviews.title: Really sweet.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but small. Removed the littlest one so my four year old grandchild didn't put it in his mouth just because he can.
customer_reviews.author: Rayne.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Penguins,
customer_reviews.text: Best gift for my 3 year old girl. She loved them for many months. They are well built, easy for her to put together, and they are still not broke.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Barney

customer_reviews.title: Young kids enjoy them
customer_reviews.text: Kids 3 years-old and 5 years-old (both boys) seem to enjoy playing with them. They are plastic and not as cute in person, after a month the paint hasn't scratched yet.
customer_reviews.author: KMR

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: A very cute set, and the penguins stay together rather than falling apart like another set I have. They are sturdy plastic. Children love playing with them. My only objection is that the two smallest penguins pose a choking hazard, so I removed them for my under 2 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Klinger

customer_reviews.title: A really fun learning skills toy
customer_reviews.text: My three yo grandson LOVES these stacking penguins. He takes them every where with him and he tells stories about all of them from the Big Daddy penguin right down to the teeny tiny baby penguin. Gives him all sorts of hand eye, problem solving, story telling skills.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Larsen

customer_reviews.title: This set was great and he was thrilled
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves penguins. This set was great and he was thrilled. Beautifully made and the back of the package gave a history of the Matryoshika dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Pamilla Pardoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality....
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality. Was looking for something not wooden, as I need to wash frequently. Only gripe is that the penguins all look so similar, which is too challenging for young children. Wish they were different colors for a visual cue.
customer_reviews.author: VJH

customer_reviews.title: they are adorable and a great addition to my collection of nesting ...
customer_reviews.text: they are adorable and a great addition to my collection of nesting dolls, and feel safe enough for children 5 and up to play with.
customer_reviews.author: margaret rowe

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old plays with these constantly
customer_reviews.text: My 3 YO granddaughter left all of her many Christmas gift lay on the floor as she played all day with this set. She talked to the penguins and spent a long time figuring out her own system of getting them correctly nested. Great toy. Requires actual child's hands and no batteries. Makes no noise. Wow. Looking for hundred more toys that meet THOSE specs!
customer_reviews.author: Samosee

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Autistic son loves them. He’s not gentle with toys and he is a perfectionist. Haven’t broken yet and they close nicely and open easily but not too easily. Great find!!!
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaSwan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for collectors of penguin or Russian stacking dolls. So many pieces.
customer_reviews.text: So cute. My husband collects penguins. For his birthday we all sat and watched as he opened them one by one. We kept thinking that it had to be the last one. It was fun. They were so small in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Btagent2

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: my son is obsessed with easter eggs....and these work great for Christmas gift...
customer_reviews.author: shantelle

customer_reviews.title: Real cute
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest dang thing you can buy a child or penguin loving girlfriend. I always loved the Russian nesting dolls (and eggs for that matter) but never had an excuse to buy one before.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Rendek

customer_reviews.title: Great, classic nesting toy.
customer_reviews.text: Sweet little nesting toy! My two-year-old got it for his birthday and he loves it. He hasn't quite mastered putting it all back together after taking it apart but he loves playing with them all separately and lining them up in size order.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: item of very average quality, with painted-on graphics looking as though they will not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Sveta Walyon

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect. The smallest one was about an inch and ...
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect. The smallest one was about an inch and they fit great inside each other. We wrapped each one individually and placed it inside the next biggest one.
customer_reviews.author: KOsb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves nesting toys. They keep her busy!
customer_reviews.author: John Falkowski II

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Cute nesting penguins. A little smaller than I expected but it is a lot of fun for the young to play with and hide stuff in. Made of plastic, not super heavy and not too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: So cute, wish it came in more boy characters, I think my grand son will love them for Easter, I remember them well as a child. Got my grand daughter the little girls, which are much cuter. Very happy with the choice.
customer_reviews.author: Cindra Mongiovi

customer_reviews.title: very small but good quality
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute and sturdy. All the pieces fit well and the kid loves playing with them. The downside is the whole set is small, and as you go down through the pieces, the get really tiny. The smallest penguin is smaller than a match box
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these nesting dolls. He spends a lot of time playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Fit loose
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this but they dont fit together tightly!
customer_reviews.author: BabyFlo

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and perfect for keeping 3 year old entertained
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and perfect for keeping 3 year old entertained. He loves comparing sizes and very easy to open/ close/ nest without help. Also fun for our 15 month old, but definitely have to supervise with small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Little Penguin Family
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave 4 instead of 5 stars is that several of the dolls had the same faces. The biggest seems to be the papa, and based on the eyelashes, the second one down seems to be the mama, and all of the children except for the baby had the same faces. A little variety would have earned this a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Historical Reader

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my grandson he loves Penguins Good price
customer_reviews.author: Barbs Threads

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son loves these penguin nesting toys. He loves to put them in order and stack them back into one. They are made of a durable material so I don't have to worry about them breaking. Definitely recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: One major flaw
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great niece and it's fine except for the fact that the largest section will not stay sealed. You cannot pick the item up by the top without it coming apart at the crack. This is rather disappointing to me since I felt like something that cost $9.99 should be of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Beckwith

customer_reviews.title: Great product for Autism
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these nesting dolls for my grandson. He is artistic and this is one of his favorite toys. He plays with them for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Cute and my son loves them. Penguins are very thin plastic. They have lasted longer than I thought they would. We have had them a bit over a month at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Gal

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old granddaughter plays with it constantly and takes it everywhere! She puts it in her doll stroller, bath, and sand box. She hides other toys in the larger penguins. This is the one toy she won't share so it is time to get one for my grandson! It is very sturdy, clicks together easily and stays together. The paint has held up well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DenverGran

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too light, cheap plastic. It won't last long in my pre-k class.
customer_reviews.author: aunticlau

customer_reviews.title: penguin nesting dolls
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter, so that she would have something to play with at my house. She liked my wooden nesting dolls that are to fragile for her to play with, these are plastic. She really liked having a variety of things and she can interchange them with the catsthat I bought her at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: PEG58

customer_reviews.title: Bought for X-mas for the wife. It made her ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for X-mas for the wife. It made her smile. That's all I needed. Kinda cheaply made, but a must for any penguin enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: S Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Fun skills game for older kids
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a Christmas gift for our 7 yr old Grandson. He loves nesting toys but not the "baby" kind. These are quite cute and nest nicely inside. You also have to put each of them together first (match bottom and top), so it's actually 2 skills in one game.
customer_reviews.author: darlene white

customer_reviews.title: Nesting penguins a huge hit!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. Bought it for a 1 year old. The penguins faces are so cute and expressive and the child responds to them with baby chatter. Even the largest penguin is small enough for a baby to grasp easily yet much to large to be a choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: but she is happy so I am too
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these! I feel as if they could be a bit bigger for what you are getting, but she is happy so I am too. She has a lot of fun stacking and unstacking them. I love anything that keeps her entertained!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole West

customer_reviews.title: Love Them Penguins
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love penguins! Hard plastic is grandson's preference. Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: LKC

customer_reviews.title: Love love
customer_reviews.text: My son is over the moon about this toy. Now if we could just keep track of the pieces long enough to find the whole set. Maybe buy two sets so that if you lose one piece you can replace it?
customer_reviews.author: Megan R

customer_reviews.title: Play visions club earth penguine parade
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my adult son for christmas and he seems to be quite satisfied with them,so i guess i'll call it a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Purple

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my three year-old and she loves them! Decent quality and I like that these are easy for little hands to pull apart and open with ease. Plastic is durable enough that it shouldn't break unless stepped on or handled with excessive force.
customer_reviews.author: NiFO

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old loves this!!
customer_reviews.text: My Penguin-loving 5 year old loves his. He got it as a "prize" for collecting good boy Pom-poms. It's one of his favorite things. The baby one with closed eyes is especially cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Chianese

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 5 year old who has been wanting stacking "dolls" for a long time. Since he loves penguins this was a perfect fit for him. He was surprised to get down to the last penguin and see how small it was. It became the first thing he took for share time.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: super cute and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, my daughter loves it too! Really cute, easy to take apart, and she plays with it a lot! Great find for my penguin lover! It is also great because she loves little things and hiding and stacking toys. Have ours for a year now, and still love it!
customer_reviews.author: smlwoman

customer_reviews.title: Plastic
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them, they are made of plastic, unlike normal nesting dolls, which is great for kids to play with, rather than a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Alyholic

customer_reviews.title: As other reviews had said, the pieces are very ...
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews had said, the pieces are very hard to pull apart. They will have to be sanded before I give them to my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Child proof
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a 2 year old and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: lexi

customer_reviews.title: Great for Toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old daughter loves these penguins! She plays with them everyday! We use them to talk about families and relationships, counting, colors, and shapes. They are great! Also, really a nice tool for working with small hands and teaching how to put things together.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great puzzle toy for preschool.
customer_reviews.text: Was initially disappointed they were plastic... However, they have survived a week so far in my preschool class with some intense play! The kids absolutely love them, and they are great for teaching a number of concepts.
customer_reviews.author: GranJan

product_meta.title: Penguin Nesting Dolls - 6 Matryoshka Penguins - All Hollow To Fit Inside Each Other
product_meta.description:
This unique nesting doll set includes 6 different plastic penguin nesting dolls. Packaging displays a history of the "Matryoshka" or nesting doll craft and interesting Penguin Facts. This set would make a great gift for someone who loves animals or wildlife, and children will love the surprise of finding the dolls inside. Each figure is hollow so it can store your "secret stuff" when it is not storing the other penguin dolls.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Such a cute family. Six Penguins ranging from 4.5" to 2" in height, stack neatly inside of each other like Russian Nesting Dolls. They're hollow for storing all your "secret stuff" too.
feature_bullets: Penguins Range From 4.5'' to 2" in Height.
Every Penguin Is Hollow To Keep Your Secret Stuff Inside.
Pack Comes With Facts About Pengins, Their Habitat and History.
Great Educational Gift For All Ages
